mapper.sql: id, type_id, name, org_id, idcardno, number, title, mobile, mobile_short, intercom_group, intercom_person, gps_id, gps_name

p.id, p.type_id as typeId,pt.name as typeName, p.name, p.org_id as orgId,o.short_name as orgName,p.idcardno, p.number, p.title, p.mobile, p.mobile_short as mobileShort, p.intercom_group as intercomGroup, p.intercom_person, p.gps_id as gpsId, p.gps_name as gpsName,o.code as orgCode,o.path as orgPath

mapper.update:
update t_police
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idcardno = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_short = #{mobileShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intercom_group = #{intercomGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intercom_person = #{intercomPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_id = #{gpsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gps_name = #{gpsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_police set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idcardno = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_short = #{mobileShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intercom_group = #{intercomGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intercom_person = #{intercomPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_id = #{gpsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gps_name = #{gpsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_police where number = #{code} or number = #{password}
select * from t_policetype order by id asc
select * from t_intercom_group order by id asc
select id, number as name from t_gps where org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id asc

select
from t_police
order by id
limit #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from t_police p left join t_policetype pt on pt.id = p.type_id left join organ o on o.id = p.org_id
order by id
limit #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
